Open Science is a movement to make scientific research (including publications, data, software) transparent and accessible so that knowledge is shared. This repository provides resources to help NOAA Fisheries Passive Acoustic Monitoring groups adopt an **Open Science** approach to their research.

During the NOAA Fisheries PAM Strategic Meeting, we will work together using Open Science Methods. To prepare for a successful meeting, we request that you complete all "Pre Meeting Prep" Tasks prior to the meeting.

***These tasks must be completed prior to the meeting to ensure you are able to participate fully.***
